name: blue-ocean
description: Congratulations and welcome to your first day at Blue Ocean! We are literally an underwater agile software development company.

scripts.setup: npm install && cd ./client && npm install ; cd ../server && npm install
scripts.test: echo pwd && cd ./client && npm test ; cd ../server && npm test
scripts.launch: cd ./server && node bin/www & cd ./client && npm run-script start &
scripts.pm2-start: npm run setup && cd ./client && npm run build && cd ../server && npm run start
scripts.lint: cd server && npm run lint && cd ../client && npm run lint

author: HRATX39
